summary: Fitness exercise library application with exercise management capabilities
architectural_notes: Exercise library with CRUD operations for exercises
Muscle groups include: full body (and others)
Equipment types include: treadmill, assault bike, bike, Stairmaster

existing_features.title: Create a home page as the landing route ("/") with navigation to the main sections: Exercise Library, Workouts, Log Weight, and Progress
Add functionality to create new exercises in the exercise library with fields for name, equipment type, and muscle group
Add functionality to edit existing exercises in the exercise library, allowing updates to name, equipment type, and muscle group
Add functionality to delete exercises from the exercise library

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable editing, adding, and deleting exercises in exercise library
Add 'full body' to muscle group options
Add treadmill, assault bike, bike, and Stairmaster to equipment options
Add 'Full Body' as a valid muscle group option in the backend MuscleGroup type and include it in all muscle group selections
Add Treadmill, Assault Bike, Bike, and Stairmaster as valid equipment options in the backend EquipmentType and include them in all equipment selections
